sub_title: Seasoned Project & Change lead | Digital transformation | Philanthropist
summary: A seasoned project and change manager with 16 years of combined experience in telecommunications and financial services sector. Worked for insurance based conglomerate and leading telecommunications company with cross-functional diverse teams of specialists and stakeholders. An excellent understanding of Product Development Life Cycle, Software Development Life Cycle, Agile/Scrum frameworks, project management as well as change and adoption techniques. Experience in setting and maturing Project Management Offices (PMO) using tailored approaches (Scrum and Waterfall) ensuring the right initiatives are delivered in the right way whilst managing team’s energy. Highly skilled in communication across all levels and report writing for internal use and external publications.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

education.field_of_study: Business, Management, Marketing, and Related Support Services

certifications.name: Scrum Master Certified (SMC)
certifications.authority: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile

company.name: SCRUMstudy - Accreditation Body for Scrum and Agile

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for the translation of the Group function strategy into a delivery roadmap. Managing company-wide projects through an Agile approach, people management and business liaison.

•	Strategy development and implementation in consultation with Centre of Excellence(s)
•	Defining and implementing of processes and procedures for the Group function
•	Manage end-to-end project delivery, governance, resource capacity modelling and allocation
•	Manages and lead the Project Management Office team that consists of direct reports of 
         Project Coordinators, Change Managers & Digital Marketing
•	Use of Agile methodology values, principles, and practices to plan, manage, and deliver 
         solutions.
•	Train, mentor and support squads to follow agile values, principles, and practices.
•	Collaborate closely with Product Owners and DevOps Lead to prepare and clarify product 
        backlog.
•	Manage the communication of the portfolio to the Board, ExCo, internal and external 
        stakeholders. 
•	Ensure the proper use of collaborative processes and remove impediments for the scrum team
•	Conduct industry research & assess market trends to communicate insights to the Group
•	Serve as business liaison to ensure the right initiatives are delivered at the right time
•	Create a platform for project managers to share knowledge, lessons learnt and cross 
        collaboration through a Community of Practice
•	Compile internal and external stakeholder reports
•	Write content and manage the HR digital communications to drive adoption of products
         through the omni-channel experience
profile_positions.title: Head: Project Management & Reporting

profile_positions.description:
Independently manage all the strategic company-wide projects together with driving change and adoption of products and services using different channels. 
•	Driving implementation of strategic initiatives and projects; including governance and reporting 
        using Agile Framework
•	Schedule and facilitate agile ceremonies form product backlog refinement, capacity planning, 
        daily stand-ups, to sprint reviews, and retrospectives.
•	Facilitate the build or buy software as a service decision
•	Manage the SaaS vendor process 
•	Compile quarterly business report for Executive Committee
•	Serve as business development liaison between Group Human Capital and wider business units
•	Represent Group Human Capital in governance forums such as PoPIA Steerco, COO and Risk 
         Assurance.
•	Group Human Capital management representative in Employment Equity Forum, driving
         transformation objectives
•	Compile monthly and quarterly Group Human Capital reports as well writing inserts for the
         financial integrated report
•	Manage the Occupational Health and Safety Portfolio for the conglomerate
•	Manages and leads the Project Management Office team that consists of direct reports of
        Project Coordinators, Change Managers & Digital Marketing
•	Write content and manage the HR digital communications to drive adoption of products
         through the omni-channel experience
profile_positions.title: Strategic Projects, Change and Digital Marketing Lead

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the implementation of fit-for-purpose consumer products using PDLC. 
•	Manage all projects assigned, ensuring that they are completed within specified scope, time, 
         agreed quality and budget according to adopted Agile framework
•	Scrum Master facilitating stand-ups, dealing with obstacles and coach teams
•	Schedule and facilitate agile ceremonies form product backlog refinement, capacity planning, 
     daily stand-ups, to sprint reviews, and retrospectives.
•	Support Product Owner in managing stakeholders
•	Ensure that products are taken to market with all commercially impacted areas identified and 
        addressed across all required channels, prior to approval for launch
•	Develop and maintain stakeholder relationship both external and internal
•	Prepare and communicate progress reports, status reports and meeting minutes to 
        stakeholders
•	Postpaid portfolio and omni-channel lead
profile_positions.title: Project Manager | Central Demand Project Management Office

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for the successful migration/cutover/delivery and support of services that has been sold to medium-large enterprises that includes resourcing, reporting and billing. Products and services includes MPLS, WAN, LAN, WLAN, firewalls, ADSL, Diginet, WiMAX, VoIP solution and cloud hosting. 
•	End to end management of network and infrastructure projects to medium-large companies in 
       South Africa and rest of Africa.
•	Using the signed quote as a blueprint to commence work on solution to be deployed and skilled 
        resources to be assigned.  
•	Serve as point of contact to the customer until handed over to Service Manager and/or CSOC 
•	Keep stakeholders up to date on project progress through weekly status reports; face-to-face 
       check-ins and virtual huddles.
•	Actively participate in the decision-making process in consulting other members of the project 
        team in line with PMO policies and processes.
•	Coordinate Layer 2 builds with Vodacom Transmission for Microwave and Fibre.
•	Manage equipment procurement with Cisco representative and/or other 3rd party suppliers.
•	Scheduling of router configuration with in-house engineer for the access medium of VSAT, 
        WiMAX, Fibre and Microwave and arrange for installation with field service engineer. 
•	Coordination of downtime, bringing up the link, migration or cutover as well as testing with 
         technical project team and customer. 
•	Support and motivate engineers in troubleshooting and/or connectivity issues that may arise. 
•	Adhere to required health and safety, environmental and quality legislations for each of sites 
        through PPE, safety files and onsite safety induction before any installation.
•	Monitor traffic performance for a 2-week soaking period with assigned engineers; making 
         adjustments if needed.
•	Conduct financial acceptance to initiate billing ensuring that is aligned to the quote initially 
         signed and change requests.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader | Enterprise Technology Project Management Office
